newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australia rate cut shows govt problems - Opposition.
newsitem.headline: Australia rate cut shows govt problems - Opposition.

text.p: Australia's latest official interest rate cut was a product of the government's economic mismanagement, the Labor opposition said on Friday.
Opposition treasury spokesman Gareth Evans also criticised banks for only passing on part of Friday's 0.5 percentage point cut to home loan customers.
"The cut is a product of the government's mishandling of the economy last year," Evans said in a statement.
"This is the third attempt in six months by the Reserve Bank to repair confidence in the economy by cutting interest rates."
